required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study of TQ-A3334 Combined With Entecavir in the Treatment of Chronic Hepatitis B
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Double-blinded, Placebo-controlled, Phase IIa Study of TQ-A3334 Combined With Entecavir in the Treatment of Untreated or HBV DNA Negative Subjects With Chronic Hepatitis B

lead_sponsor.agency: Chia Tai Tianqing Pharmaceutical Group Co., Ltd.

clinical_study.source: Chia Tai Tianqing Pharmaceutical Group Co., Ltd.

brief_summary.textblock: This is a randomized, double-blinded, placebo-controlled, phase IIa study to evaluate safety and efficacy of TQ-A3334 combined with entecavir in the untreated or HBV DNA negative subjects with Chronic Hepatitis B.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Hour 0, 5, 10, 20, 30 minutes, 1, 2 , 3 , 6 , 12, 24, 72 , 168 hours post-dose at week 1 and week 12; Hour 0 of week 4, week 7, week 9, week 11.
primary_outcome.description: Cmax is the maximum plasma concentration of TQ-A3334 or metabolite(s).

primary_outcome.time_frame: Hour 0, 5, 10, 20, 30 minutes, 1, 2 , 3 , 6 , 12, 24, 72 , 168 hours post-dose at week 1 and week 12; Hour 0 of week 4, week 7, week 9, week 11.
primary_outcome.description: To characterize the pharmacokinetics of TQ-A3334 by assessment of time to reach maximum plasma concentration.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Hour 0, 5, 10, 20, 30 minutes, 1, 2 , 3 , 6 , 12, 24, 72 , 168 hours post-dose at week 1 and week 12; Hour 0 of week 4, week 7, week 9, week 11.
primary_outcome.description: To characterize the pharmacokinetics of TQB3804 by assessment of area under the plasma concentration time curve from zero to infinity.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Hour 0, 1.5 , 12 , 24 , 72 hours post-dose at week 1 and week 12; Hour 0 at week 7.
primary_outcome.description: Including IFN-α, IFN-γ, TNF-α, IL-6, IL-2, MCP-1 and so on.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 pre-dose, day 84, day 168, day 336 post-dose.
secondary_outcome.description: Including HBsAg, HBsAb, HBeAb, anti-HBc, HBV-DNA, HBV RNA and HBcrAg.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Hour 0 pre-dose, day 56, day 84, day 168 at post-dose.
secondary_outcome.description: Analysis of immune cell response to hepatitis B antigen after treatment.

arm_group.description: Subjects receive TQ-A3334 (1.2 mg QW) and entecavir (0.5 mg qd) in 24 weeks
Subjects receive placebo (0 mg QW) and entecavir (0.5 mg qd) in 24 weeks

intervention.description: TQ-A3334 is a kind of TLR7 receptor agonist.
Placebo is a treatment which is designed to have no therapeutic value.
Entecavir (ETV) tablet is an antiviral medication used in the treatment of hepatitis B virus (HBV) infection.

facility.name: The second affiliated hospital of chongqing medical university
The first hospital of Jilin University
